      • generateConfidenceScore

        public void generateConfidenceScore(BatchInstanceID batchInstanceID,
                           java.lang.String pluginWorkflow)
                             throws DCMAException
        Description copied from interface: SearchClassificationService
        This method generates the confidence score using Lucene engine. It reads each HOCR file from batch xml, generate confidence score from the sample index stored, fetches maximum of 5 close matches and stores first at page level field and others as alternate values.
        Specified by:
        generateConfidenceScore in interface SearchClassificationService
        Parameters:
        batchInstanceID - BatchInstanceID
        pluginWorkflow - String
        Throws:
        DCMAException

      • generateConfidenceScoreAPI

                              HocrPages hocrPages,
                              java.lang.String workingDir,
                              java.util.Map<LuceneProperties,java.lang.String> propertyMap,
                              java.lang.String batchClassIdentifier)
                                throws DCMAException
        Description copied from interface: SearchClassificationService
        Generates the confidence scores for the input pages.
        Specified by:
        generateConfidenceScoreAPI in interface SearchClassificationService
        Parameters:
        xmlDocuments - List the document object for pages.
        hocrPages - HocrPages the hocr pages for input pages.
        workingDir - String the working directory for processing.
        propertyMap - Map the property map for the plugin.
        batchClassIdentifier - String the batch class identifier.
        Throws:
        DCMAException - the exception for issues in processing.

                                           boolean createIndex)
                                             throws DCMAException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Performs learning for a batch class using the plugin selected for ocr'ing in the batch class configuration
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        createIndex - specifies wheteher to create lucene indexes or not
